channel.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
channel.description:
alright so here's the thing lastweek i got a new computer But this one runs on vista wich my older pc didnt it that was running on XP So well i've been playing alot of 508's and 525's and 517's No problem Had a great time but then yesterday i went searching a 317 and i found downloaded it i login and assoon i walk it just shuts down and gives a error in my batch file , also i cant read what it ses coz it closes to fast but it makes this File calld hs_err_pid9468 wich contains the following text # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d46, pid=9468, tid=8916 # # JRE version: 6.0_16-b01 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.2-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d46] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

So after trying that i tried over 25 difrent clients/servers i tried everything!!! aka, updating java. Updating to Vista service Pack 2, Contacting java help service some1 please help me out :(?

item.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_So_Cool Java Is So Cool
item.description:
@Java_Is_So_Cool wrote:

you have to install 32 bit java for it to work

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
item.dc:creator: @remyros remyros
item.description:
@remyros wrote:

zyle1992:

I think it’s a 64-bit java problem. My 64-bit linux machine didn’t work with java either.

anyway i can fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2009, 07:36:28 am[/size][hr]BUMP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2009, 08:55:39 am[/size][hr]CMON PLEASE SOME1 HELP ME!!!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I think it’s a 64-bit java problem. My 64-bit linux machine didn’t work with java either.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
item.dc:creator: @remyros remyros
item.description:
@remyros wrote:

zyle1992:

Let me guess, 64-bit quad core copmuter, and you can only cliek the client twice before it crashes, right?

yes , no the server wasnt Shangri-la…? i’ve tried over 20 servers

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?

item.title: 317 - 417 servers dont work for me
item.dc:creator: @remyros remyros
item.description:
@remyros wrote:

alright so here’s the thing lastweek i got a new computer But this one runs on vista
wich my older pc didnt it that was running on XP
So well i’ve been playing alot of 508’s and 525’s and 517’s No problem Had a great time
but then yesterday i went searching a 317 and i found downloaded it i login and assoon i walk it just shuts down and gives a error in my batch file , also i cant read what it ses coz it closes to fast
